thread.title: U.S. inflation threat spooks global markets

title: U.S. inflation threat spooks global markets
text:
U.S. inflation threat spooks global markets  58 
Stock markets were routed around the globe on Monday, with European indexes opening lower and bond yields rising as resurgent U.S. inflation raised the possibility central banks would tighten policy more aggressively than had been expected.   
Stock markets were routed around the globe on Monday, with European indexes opening lower and bond yields rising as resurgent U.S. inflation raised the possibility central banks would tighten policy more aggressively than had been expected.  //reut.rs/2nJ9uBD
